ExampleDefinition.Title: Create Annotations dynamically
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates the Modifiers API to create Text, Line, Box, LineArrow and Custom Annotations dynamically.
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Create Annotations Dynamically</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Using the CreateAnnotationsModifier available in the Premium Edition of SciChart you can give your users the ability to create annotations dynamically via mouse-clicks.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">To create Text, AxisMarkers, Paths, Horizontal and Vertical Lines, simply click once. </Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">After creating and selecting an annotation, you can drag, resize and delete it. </Run>
